channel.title: Business analytics Portfolio on Rox Chen
channel.description: Recent content in Business analytics Portfolio on Rox Chen

item.title: Project 1: KPMG Data analytics consulting virtual program
item.description: Cleaned up more than 1 million underling data and eliminated the data issues based on standard data quality dimensions. Analysed the business sales by different marketing channels and customer segmentations. Built classification models to provide data solutions and predict valuable customers based on RFM metrics. Designed and created Tableau Dashboard to visualise key digital marketing metrics including profitability in different industries, genders and states. Here is a dashboard output for business analytics which gives the analyst info for customer.

item.title: Project 2: EWT Business analytics
item.description: This is a project I did in my master course, where I build a effective database for an Electric Wheels Transport company. The main reason behind carrying out this project was to help EWT as a start-up business to establish a database and boost business performance. Using appropriate fact-finding techniques to collect business requirements. Cleaned more than 10k customer raw data and eliminated integrity constraints and default values and created a data dictionary.

item.title: Project 3: A digital solution for Unsustainable patterns
item.description: Using Enterprise Architect software to justify, analyse and design software applications. Deployed the software to tackle the 17% of total food is wasted at the consumer level. Created 10 UML diagrams, including Use case diagram, Activity diagram, Process Sequence diagram, Domain Class diagram, State Machine diagram, to simplify the food deliver and customer consuming process. Here is the one of UML diagrams which improved the shopping process efficiency.

item.title: About
item.description: Data analytics and Data visualisation are my passion. I completed my bachelor degree in public management. Since the fresher, I was obsessed with data, and I learned Tableau Builder and MC Excel to clean up row data by myself. This Portfolio shows the recent projects I have worked on.
